DOC.criteria: Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria Normal Cohort All study subject able provide inform consent Males females age 40 year old ( see section A8 rationale inclusion female ) Individuals Arab descent Qatari peninsula without personal family history prostate cancer Individuals family history prostate cancer Individuals deem good overall health investigator accept study Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria Prostate Cohort All study subject able provide inform consent Males age 40 year old Individuals Qatari Peninsula whose ancestor three generation back native Qatar .
